name: Complete Web Graphics
description:
CWG is one of the fastest growing Website Development Company in Kolkata, India. We believe in transforming ideas & concepts to form brand. We are analyst, strategist, artists & producers who takes pride in creating unique concepts & ideas eventually transforming a dormant business to a booming one, engaging your clients into an intelligent & innovative digital experience.
Our area of expertise includes Graphics Designing Services, Mobile Apps Development Service, Software Development Services, Web Designing Services, WordPress Website Development and Optimization, Magento Development and Optimization, PHP Development Services, HTML 5 Development Services & last but not the least we also offer Digital Marketing Services.
We strive to provide optimum result through all the services that we offer. Based on your requirement we offer the most customized service at a very affordable rate. Our success lies in working as a ROI focussed and highly organized team for all our projects. We always make sure to deliver quality work within predefined time frame.
We have a strong team of 18 people including web designer having Art degree from some of the best art colleges in India and Web developer having Bachelor and Master Engineering degree from renowned IT Engineering Colleges in India.  
 Expertise in
- WordPress
- Web Design
- eCommerce Websites
- PHP
- SEO
- Facebook/Twitter/Linkedin/Youtube/Google+ Cover Page Design
- Responsive Conversion
- Bootstrap
- PSD to HTML5/CSS3/jQuery
- Custom Website Designs
- Joomla migration and Integration
